text:
hi,
  since HSSF cannot read an excel file which has XML inside it( gives invalid
hearder exception), I was wondering if there is any tool that can convert an XML
excel file into a conventional Excel file. In other words a toold that can
mimick the process of openning the XML Excel file and saving it as Excel.
creator: sashianand@lycos.com
avik@apache.org
text: off topic. POI/HSSF is a BIFF8 file reader.
